snippet: In two decisive Game 7 road wins on Wednesday night, Los Angeles came back from three games down to finish off San Jose, and Minnesota beat Colorado in overtime.
lead_paragraph: In two decisive Game 7 road wins on Wednesday night, Los Angeles came back from three games down to finish off San Jose, and Minnesota beat Colorado in overtime.

headline.main: Kings Beat Sharks, and Wild Top Avalanche in Game 7s
headline.print_headline: Kings Beat Sharks, and Wild Top Avalanche in Game 7s
